settings.pages_progress_title: A Powerful eBike to Conquer all Terrains
settings.pages_progress_Info: Unleash the power to dominate every terrain and weather with this robust fat tire eBike.
Feel the surge of the exhilarating 750W (1000W Peak) hub motor, propelling you to remote and extraordinary destinations.
The UL certified 720Wh LG battery delivers up to 60 miles of assisted range with a single charge.
Never run out of power outdoors with our 2-in-1 motor technology. Extended range, extra fun. (Plug-in charging is available too)
Embark on effortless exploration with puncture-resistant, durable 26x4" fat tires.
Enjoy smooth off-road adventures with the 80mm travel suspension fork.
Ride with peace of mind! Hydraulic disc brakes provide superior stopping power in any conditions.
Take a quality ride with crisp cadence shifting whether you're a beginner or an avid cyclist.
Sync with the freebeat App for real-time ride recording, performance tracking, and navigation.
This eBike seamlessly morphs into a smart bike trainer, delivering the thrilling gamified workouts to your family.
In 3 easy steps, enjoy convenient and comfortable workouts from home.
Our patented dual-function motor technology converts calories into clean energy. 30 mins exercise = up to 10 miles³ outdoor riding range.
Access thousands of studio classes, scenic rides, and rhythm games anytime². Compete globally or go at your own pace.
Experience immersive workouts on any iOS or Android device, or cast to a smart TV for an enhanced fitness journey.
Auto-adjusts based on the instructor's cue and adapts to your unique riding style.
Detects in and out of saddle riding via sensors to deliver intense and fulfilling results.
Evaluates your performance and delivers an ideal blend of challenging yet fun program to suit each rider at the right level.

settings.online_reviews_text: "Really dope! So far, one of my best experiences with an eBike - impressive build quality and features, and the special indoor component of the bike, making it a game-changing concept!"

"There are no ebikes out there that are going to give you the same indoor exercise experience as the freebeat MorphRover. I took a 15-minute class, and I earned back 9.3 miles of outdoor use! Brilliant."
"The ginormous fat tires, which are resistant to punctures and soak up the terrain, make this thing utterly insane! It's perhaps the most fun I've had on an electric bike in quite some time."

"There's a certain level of satisfaction that comes from knowing that I put a few of the miles into this bike with my own power. I feel accomplished more than I would if I just plugged it into the wall."

settings.write_children_title: Why should you invest in a Lit Bike Space Black cycling bike?
settings.write_children_info: The freebeat™ Lit Bike is a black indoor bike with many features that differentiate it from other black stationary bikes. With thousands of on-demand classes to choose from, you’ll never get bored. Not only that, but this black exercise bike offers unique gamification that allows you to compete with friends and family to earn points and rewards. Challenges, events, and games will add a new level of fun and competition to your at-home workouts.

settings.fb_writing_title1: How Do freebeat™ Electric Bikes Work?
settings.fb_writing_desc1: freebeat™ MorphRover ebikes operate with a pedal assist, combining the rider’s pedaling with an integrated electric motor. freebeat™ electric bike is equipped with a rechargeable battery that fuels the motor, offering an extra boost during uphill climbs or against strong winds. The central processing unit, or controller, receives input from the rider through either the throttle or the pedal-assist sensors. It then delivers the appropriate power from the battery to the motor. This power is transmitted through the drivetrain, pushing the bike forward with reduced effort from the rider, providing a unique biking experience. With regards to the battery, freebeat™ MorphRover eBike has created a sully sustainable green ride by allowing riders to charge their electric bike by pedaling indoors and participating in spin classes online from the comfort of their own home, leading to a 2-in-1 innovative experience where outdoor enthusiasts can charge bike battery without charger. The freebeat™ electric bikes deliver a smooth ride indoors and turn calories into mileage during indoor cycling rides. With just 30 minutes of stationary bike workout indoors, you'll generate green energy to cover 10 miles outside.
settings.fb_writing_title2: Why Choose Class 2 E-bikes For Your Outdoor Adventures?
settings.fb_writing_desc2: Class 2 eBikes have a maximum speed of 28 mph and are the only ebike class that supports both throttle assist and pedal assist. Therefore, class 2 ebikes are ideal for longer rides and can help you navigate steep climbs and rough terrains with ease, making them perfect for outdoor enthusiasts who want a little extra boost to their ride. freebeat™ MorphRover are the best class 2 electric bikes because they're extremely eco-friendly and produce zero emissions, making them the best alternative to gas cars or motorcycles. Besides, you won't need a license or registration when riding a class 2 ebike on public roads, sidewalks, or bike lanes.
settings.fb_writing_title3: What Are Fat Tire eBikes For?
settings.fb_writing_desc3: freebeat™ 4-inch fat tire ebikes make for the best outdoor adventure companion. Fat tires provide greater control while riding the freebeat™ MorphRover ebike. The added grip helps tackle tough terrains such as sand or rocks or navigate tricky terrains like mud and snow or even steep downhill routes, making mountain biking a safer sport overall. freebeat™ larger tires absorb shocks and vibrations, improving stability whether you're exploring off-road trails, cruising through the city, exploring various types of landscapes including beaches, mountains, and forests and any terrain in between, making it a more comfortable and enjoyable ride.
